title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
description: As a sales manager, I want to view real-time sales analytics so that I can make data-driven business decisions and track performance metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays key metrics: total sales, orders, average order value
Data can be filtered by date range, product category, region
Charts show trends: daily sales, top products, customer segments
Dashboard updates in real-time (or near real-time)
User can export reports as PDF or Excel
Dashboard is responsive and works on tablets
Custom date ranges can be selected

comments.author: Data Engineer
comments.text: Building data pipeline. Using materialized views for performance.

comments.author: UX Designer
comments.text: Dashboard mockups ready. Focus on data visualization clarity.
